English: to put away; to set aside
a fabulous animal, like a small bear
two or three sons; my friends; my disciples

Qieyun: 影合一魂平?, 影合三文上?
從開一唐平?, 從開一唐去?
見一模平?, 見一模上?, 見一模去?
澄開三仙入?, 徹開三仙入?
English: to penetrate; intelligible. to remove. to tithe
the name of a mountain in Shantung (the most famous of the five Chinese Sacred Mountains)
